At 13th level, you can animate a tree within 180 feet as a standard action. This functions as a treantâ€™s animate trees ability, with the following exceptions.

Each day, you can animate a number of trees equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier, and you can control up to one tree at a time, plus an additional tree at 15th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

A tree remains animated for 10 minutes per level, or until dismissed by you or destroyed.
